sentences.en: "Daring Adventures" from '86 is a far more cohesive and successful album.
sentences.cn: 1986年发行的《勇于冒险》是一张风格更为统一也更为成功的专辑。

sentences.en: A daring robbery took place yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天发生了一宗大胆的抢劫案.

sentences.en: Bergit was probably more daring than I was.
sentences.cn: 伯吉特可能比我更敢于冒险。

sentences.en: He encouraged her to speak her mind , to be flippant and daring.
sentences.cn: 他鼓励她有什么说什么, 随便说,不拘束.

sentences.en: He was awarded a medal for his daring deeds.
sentences.cn: 他因勇敢的行为而获得奖牌.

sentences.en: His daring escape from prison gained him a certain notoriety.
sentences.cn: 他大胆的越狱使他臭名昭著.

sentences.en: His daring may have cost him his life.
sentences.cn: 他的冒险可能让他断送了性命。

sentences.en: His daring rescue saved the lives of the youngsters.
sentences.cn: 他的大胆营救保住了那些年轻人的性命。

sentences.en: It was a daring attempt but he carried it off.
sentences.cn: 那是个大胆的尝试,而他成功了.

sentences.en: The daring climbers laugh at danger.
sentences.cn: 勇敢无畏的登山者在危险面前泰然自若.

sentences.en: The daring rescue was one for the book.
sentences.cn: 这次大胆的营救行动实在了不起.

sentences.en: This was not by any means a daring expedition into the outback, it was a very unambitious exploration.
sentences.cn: 这绝不是什么冒险深入内地的远征，只是一次平淡无奇的探险而已。

trans.tran_en: involving a lot of risk or danger, or brave enough to do risky things
courage that makes you willing to take risks
